alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 08 at 9:42PM EDT until September 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT... A high risk of rip currents and rough nearshore surf. * WHERE...Maryland Beaches County. * WHEN...Through Friday evening. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 08/08 PM 3.9 1.4 0.9 1 NONE 09/07 AM 3.7 1.2 1.1 1 NONE 09/08 PM 3.9 1.4 0.8 1 NONE 10/08 AM 3.4 0.9 0.7 1 NONE 10/08 PM 3.5 1.0 0.6 1 NONE 11/09 AM 3.4 0.9 0.6 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
